net.proteusframework.ui.miwt.validation

Interface NumberValidator.NumberRestriction

  • Enclosing class:
    NumberValidator

    public static interface NumberValidator.NumberRestriction
    Defines a restriction on a Number.
    Author:
    Matt Culver (mculver@i2rd.com)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      LocalizedText getViolationMessage(LocaleContext context, Object... formatterArguments)
      Returns a LocalizedText for the restriction violation message.
      boolean violatesRestriction(Number n)
      Checks if a Number violates the restriction.

    • Method Detail

      • getViolationMessage

        LocalizedText getViolationMessage(LocaleContext context,
                                Object... formatterArguments)
        Returns a LocalizedText for the restriction violation message.
        Parameters:
        context - The LocaleContext.
        formatterArguments - Arguments for the message. The intended functionallity is to provide a single argument that is the name of the propery being validated.
        Returns:
        LocalizedText.

      • violatesRestriction

        boolean violatesRestriction(Number n)
        Checks if a Number violates the restriction.
        Parameters:
        n - The number to check.
        Returns:
        true if the Number violates the restriction and false otherwise.
